G

getCodePage() - Static method in class GreekInput
This returns the code page to be used.
getDictionary() - Method in class Suggestion
This returns the dictionary used as reference.
getMenu1() - Method in class Menu
This menu asks the user whether to input text from keyboard or a text file.
getMenu2() - Method in class Menu
This menu asks the user whether he wants to see suggestions for misspelled words.
getMenu3() - Method in class Menu
This signals the end of the program.
getPath() - Method in class GreekFile
This returns the path of the file to be read.
getSplittedWordsList() - Method in class SplitWords
This splits text into individual words having removed all non-Greek characters and punctuation except full stop.
getText() - Method in class SplitWords
This returns the text to be split.
GreekFile - Class in spellcheck
Represents a file containing some Greek text.
GreekFile(String) - Constructor for class GreekFile
This constructs a GreekFile containing some text.

GreekInput - Class in spellcheck
This class is used to get input from keyboard according to a specified code page.
